Uses of Package
com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart

  • Packages that use com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation
    The com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation package provides classes for the virtual machine evacuation capabilities offered by vCenter.
    com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart  
  • Classes in com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart used by com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation 
    Class and Description
    BestEffortRestartFactory
    BestEffortRestartFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
  • Classes in com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart used by com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart 
    Class and Description
    BestEffortRestartFactory
    BestEffortRestartFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.vcenter.compute.policies.capabilities.vm.evacuation.best_effort_restart package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
    CreateSpec
    The CreateSpec class contains information used to create a new policy that applies to virtual machines when their host is entering maintenance mode and that will cause these virtual machines to enter a powered-off state; after which these virtual machines will be powered-on as soon as possible, see Policies.create(com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Structure).
    Info
    The Info class contains information about a policy that applies to virtual machines when their host is entering maintenance mode and that will cause these virtual machines to enter a powered-off state; after which these virtual machines will be powered-on as soon as possible, see Policies.create(com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Structure).
